word: PAGES 116 AND 117: THE LORD'S SUPPER; WOMEN WASHING MEN'S FEET, AND THE HOLY KISS.--THE PIONEERS OF THE SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTIST CHURCH, HAVING ACCEPTED THE SABBATH TRUTH, EAGERLY REACHED OUT TO FOLLOW THE WORD OF GOD IN EVERY PARTICULAR, WHILE AT THE SAME TIME THEY WERE CAREFUL TO PROTECT THEMSELVES AGAINST DISTORTED INTERPRETATIONS OF THE WORD AND ANY EXTREMES OR FANATICISM. THEY SAW CLEARLY THE PRIVILEGES AND THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE LORD'S SUPPER ESTABLISHED FOR THE CHURCH BY OUR LORD. THERE WAS SOME QUESTION ABOUT FOOT WASHING AND THE HOLY KISS. IN THIS VISION THE LORD MADE CLEAR CERTAIN DELICATE POINTS THAT WOULD GUIDE AND GUARD THE EMERGING CHURCH.
